Weather delays search for missing toddler in Rockport

The search for 2-year-old Caleigh Anne Harrison on Long Beach was put on hold today due to the heavy rains, but is expected to resume on Tuesday. (Globe)

Arrest made in stabbing death of 67-year-old woman from South Boston

Timothy Kostka, 24, of South Boston has been arrested for the fatal stabbing last week of Barbara Coyne in her Seventh Street home, Boston police said. (Globe)
